hero.title: Traditional Heritage in Modern Design
hero.subtitle: Creating the finest Uzbek handicrafts and national garments since 2009

about.title: About Us
about.description: Tikuvchi Anoragul private enterprise was established in 2009 and operates in the field of handicrafts and national clothing production. The enterprise employs 15 skilled artisans. The company is a member of the Uzbekistan Artisans public association under the President of the Republic of Uzbekistan. Artisans work in hand sewing, embroidery, and pattern-making.

services.title: Our Services
services.customDesc: We create national garments based on individual measurements
services.embroideryDesc: Embroidery work in modern and traditional patterns
services.carpetDesc: Preparation of carpets in national style
services.restorationDesc: Restoration of old embroidery and clothing
services.interiorDesc: Interior decoration items in national style

order.title: Place Order
order.name: Full Name
order.agree: I agree to the terms and conditions

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How can I place an order?
faq.a1: To place an order, click the Place Order button on the website or contact us by phone
faq.a2: Yes, we offer delivery service throughout Uzbekistan. Delivery within Tashkent city takes 1-2 business days.
faq.q3: How long does it take to complete an order?
faq.a3: Standard orders are completed in 5-7 business days. For complex handwork, the timeframe is agreed individually.
faq.q4: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.a4: We accept cash, credit cards, and bank transfers.
faq.q5: Do you have a showroom or store?
faq.a5: Yes, our showroom is located in Tashkent. Address: Yunusabad district, Amir Temur street 123.
faq.a6: Yes, we accept orders worldwide. Delivery cost and timeframe are calculated individually for each order.
faq.q7: Can products be returned or exchanged?
faq.a7: Yes, if the product has a manufacturing defect, it can be exchanged or returned within 14 days.
faq.a8: We only use high-quality natural materials: atlas, silk, satin, cotton.
faq.q9: Do you accept custom design orders?
faq.a9: Absolutely! We create unique products based on your sketches and ideas.
faq.q10: Can I get a catalog or brochure?
faq.a10: Yes, you can download our product catalog from the website or get a printed copy at our showroom.
